reaperOfSouls: Killed 50 pirate ghosts and harvested their corpses.
treasureHunter: Dug or fished up 10 treasure chests.
explorer: Stepped on or gathered from every type of tile.
prepared: Equipped something in each equipment slot.
seafarer: Sailed to civilization and completed the game.
navigator: Traversed the seas in search of new lands.
treasurer: Collected every one of the five types of treasure.
pulchritudinous: Equipped a legendary item in each equipment slot.
talented: Reached 1000% in skill percentages across all skills.

chemistry: • Influences quality and success rate of crafted items using chemical mixtures.
anatomy:
• Increases accuracy of creature health, resistance, and vulnerability descriptions.
  • Decreases chance of bleeding, poisoning, and burning pain from creatures.
  • Increases effectiveness of healing consumables.
  • Increases success chance when healing.
  • Decreases chance of bleeding when using bare hands during combat/gathering.
archery: • Increases attack damage, accuracy and maximum range when using bows and firearms.
blacksmithing: • Influences quality, repair, and success rate of crafted items using metal.
botany:
• Increases chance of successfully planting a plant.
  • Increases effectiveness of eating plant-based consumables.
  • Decreases chance of trampling plants when stepping on them.
  • Increases chance of gathering resources on plants.
  • Decreases chance of stamina reduction while gathering from plants.
camping:
• Increases the amount of turns slept when using a bedroll.
  • Increases chance of starting a fire.
  • Increases the accuracy of telling the time with a sundial.
cartography:
• Increases chance to successfully read tattered maps.
  • Decreases obscurity when reading tattered maps.
claythrowing: • Influences quality and success rate of crafting items using clay.
cooking:
• Influences quality and success rate of cooking items (via crafting).
  • Influences decay of cooked items.
fishing:
• Increases chance to successfully catch a fish. Increases maximum range when using a fishing rod.
  • Increases the range in which you can gather underwater treasure from.
fletching: • Influences quality and repair rate of crafted arrows, bows, and slings.
glassblowing: • Influences quality and success rate of crafted items using glass.
leatherworking: • Influences quality, repair, and success rate of crafted items using leather.
lockPicking: • Increases chance to successfully unlock a chest.
lumberjacking:
• Increases chance of gathering resources on trees.
  • Decreases chance of stamina reduction while lumberjacking.
mining:
• Increases chance of gathering resources while hitting rock/sandstone or digging.
  • Decreases chance of stamina reduction while mining and digging.
  • Increases the range in which you can gather treasure from.
mycology:
• Increases chance of planting a mushroom.
  • Increases effectiveness of eating mushroom consumables.
  • Decreases chance of trampling mushrooms when stepping on them.
  • Increases chance of gathering resources on mushrooms.
  • Decreases chance of stamina reduction while gathering from mushrooms.
parrying:
• Increases your base defense value when holding an item in each hand.
  • Increases chance to take less damage in combat.
  • Decreases chance of stamina reduction from being attacked.
stonecrafting: • Influences quality, repair, and success rate of crafted items using stones and rocks.
swimming:
• Increases speed in water travel.
  • Decreases chance of stamina reduction in water.
tactics:
• Increases your base attack value.
  • Increases chance to hit targets in combat.
  • Decreases chance of stamina reduction while attacking.
tailoring: • Influences quality, repair, and success rate of crafted items using cloth and leather.
throwing: • Increases attack damage, accuracy, and maximum range when throwing or slinging an item.
tinkering: • Influences quality, repair, and success rate of crafted items using miscellaneous resources and methods.
trapping:
• Increases the amount of damage and success rate of trapping creatures.
  • Reduces chance of setting off traps and reduces damage taken from traps.
woodworking: • Influences quality, repair, and success rate of crafted items using wood.
taming:
• Increases chance of successfully taming a creature.
  • Increases length of time creature will be tamed for.
  • Decreases chance of stamina reduction when taming/offering/milking.
  • Decreases amount of happiness reduced when milking goats.
  • Increases chance of taming when offering an aberrant creature items.
gardening:
• Increases chance of successfully tilling or harvesting.
  • Decreases chance of stamina reduction while tilling or harvesting.
  • Influences quality and success rate of crafting items requiring gardening skill.

fire: A dangerous open flame providing heat and light.
honeyFungus: A parasitic tree fungus that can grow and spread on living, decaying, and dead plant material.

menuNewGameDescription: Create a new world with your choice of settings.
menuNewGameChoiceDifficultyCasualDescrip: Dying will respawn you in the last place you rested or slept. All items will be dropped at the location of your demise.
menuNewGameChoiceDifficultyHardcoreDescr: The default and definitive way to play. Permanent character death is enabled.
menuNewGameChoiceDifficultyDailyChalleng: Uses a random seed which changes every 24 hours. This mode features low starting reputation, lower skills, less items, and difficult starting creatures for an extreme challenge. Skills are gained four times faster. Saving is disabled in this mode.
menuNewGameChoiceMultiplayerDescription: Allow friends to join your world. Limited to real-time turns mode.
menuNewGameChoiceTurnsManualDescription: Turns only pass as players perform actions.
menuNewGameChoiceTurnsRealTimeDescriptio: Turns happen automatically as time passes.
